item.title: 2 Navy pilots shot down over Red Sea in 'friendly fire' incident: Military
item.description: Two U.S. Navy pilots ejected safely over the Red Sea after their F/A-18 fighter aircraft was mistakenly shot down in "an apparent case of friendly fir...

item.title: NYPD in high-level shakeup amid sexual misconduct claims, Adams probe
item.description: The highest-ranking uniformed officer of the NYPD abruptly resigned overnight amid accusations of sexual misconduct.

item.title: WATCH: 3rd grader caught on camera saving choking student
item.description: Thomas Conley, 8, jumped into action when he noticed his classmate was choking in their school cafeteria.

item.title: What's in the approved government funding bill
item.description: After days of heated negotiations on Capitol Hill, the House passed its funding bill to prevent a government shutdown Friday night.
